New Records: Miguel Terceros scored the winning goal in the 58th minute
Key Match Events: Bolivia overcame a 20th-minute red card to central midfielder Hector Cuellar
Colombia was stunned by a 1-0 loss
Pre-Game Insights: Bolivia's fortunes have taken a dramatic upturn since the country started playing home qualifiers in El Alto
Post-Match Reflections: Bolivia's dream of reaching the World Cup for only the fourth time in history was given another boost
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bolivia is now sitting in fourth place in the South American standings with 12 points from nine games
The top six finishers in the round-robin tournament qualify automatically for the 2026 World Cup in North America
Others: El Alto, the home venue of Bolivia, is situated more than 4,000m (13,100 feet) above sea level
